summary: The Coast Guard is modernizing its ships by investing billions of dollars in its highest priority programs. We testified on our prior reports about programs that continue to face delays and rising costs—partly because the Coast Guard didn't have the right information about technology, design, or cost at key decision points. For example, the Coast Guard aims to buy 25 new ships for offshore missions...
title: Coast Guard Recapitalization: Actions Needed to Better Manage Acquisition Programs and Address Affordability Concerns
